name: querySapHanaDatabases
description: Returns summary information for SAP HANA databases connected to the CDM cluster.

effective_sla_domain_id.description: The ID of the SLA Domain that controls the protection of the host.

primary_cluster_id.description: The ID of the Rubrik cluster that provides primary protection for the SAP HANA databases.

name.description: The name of the SAP HANA database.

sla_assignment.description: The name of the SLA Domain that controls the protection of the SAP HANA database.

limit.description: Limit the number of matches returned.

offset.description: An integer that specifies a number of initial matches to ignore.

is_relic.description: Specify whether the SAP HANA database is accessible on the Rubrik cluster.

sort_by.description: Specifies the SAP HANA Database attribute to use in sorting the summary information.

sort_order.description: The order to sort the responses by. Valid choices are asc (ascending) and desc (descending).
